title: Calories in Seedless Red Grapes
meta_description: Discover calories in red grapes seedless per 100 g, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Fresh, seedless red grapes (e.g., Thompson or Flame variety); washed, with skin; no added sugars or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels for packaged grapes when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of seedless red grapes provide ~69 kcal, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in red grapes seedless per 100 g?
What are the carbs in seedless red grapes?
faqs.a: About 18 g carbs, including 0.9 g fiber and 15.5 g natural sugars per 100 g.

faqs.q: Do seedless red grapes have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low: 0.2 g fat and 0.7 g protein per 100 g.

faqs.q: Calories in a cup of red grapes seedless?
faqs.a: A cup (about 151 g) has roughly 104 kcal.

faqs.q: Are seedless red grapes low sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only 2 mg sodium per 100 g naturally.
